这是我第一次上Steam评论游戏，因为实在忍不住差评的冲动。这是我见过最垃圾的游戏，为啥他是最垃圾的游戏呢，因为他是最垃圾的厂商制作呢。为什么说是最垃圾的厂商呢，我给大家讲个故事。
话说十几年前，有一个朋友发明了几款很有意思的发明。陪伴我们童年到大学，到娶妻生子为人父母。那时对我们对他极为尊重，感觉他是给我们带来快乐的朋友，甚至称呼他为**BABA。直到去年那个我们爱戴尊敬的BABA再也不存在了，他露出了他本来贪婪的面目，在贪婪面前放弃了我们这些陪伴他十几年的朋友。直到那时候我们才认清这龟孙子的面目，我们在他面前无足轻重，在他眼里我们就像羊圈里的羊，随时可以拿我们撸羊毛。
Give me back the money of the first generation, let's talk.
虽然都骂它 但它曾经让我开心过

Un juego antes disfrutable, ahora estropeado por una serie de malas e inexplicables decisiones por parte de Blizzard. Si en algún momento fue un excelente hero shooter con personalidad y jugabilidad increible, ahora solo queda una caparazón seca que Blizzard todavía intenta ordeñar por unos cuántos dólares más. Todo esto no sería un problema si todavía existiera Overwatch 1, pero ni siquiera eso queda.

We were promised a whole new game, which we waited 5 years for, got zero content in that time, only to get a new Archives mission 5 years later and nothing that was promised. Blizzard and the Overwatch team are a living example of how you can still be massively let down even with 0 expectations 🤣🤣

I've waited many years to post this review. I can say in short that I've been a much bigger fan of OW1 than OW2.
Blizzard is known to pick the reviews they only like and they are aware that free speech on reviews is going to ruin the image of their games, as it did happen with its launch on Steam.
Their forums are heavily biased against people who don't agree with game updates or the core game design. Don't waste your time trying to argue with people there.
So far I had the opportunity like from no other game, to get false adverting, extremely aggressive micro transactions, chaotic game balancing etc.

In detail, this is what you get for playing this game:
- You cannot play Quick Play/Unranked and feel like it's a normal casual game. It's simply the same game but without the ranking system. You'll be blamed for having fun or chilling, and slowly you'll start to think competitively in the unranked games
(Bonus: you'll get penalized for leaving QUICK PLAY/CASUAL games as it would a comp game)

- You're forced to play whatever map is picked by the matchmaking, and some maps are just unbearable to play

- The matchmaking for the previous month (regardless of quick play or ranked games) has been a roller coaster, simply put: you either roll a team, or you get rolled by the enemy team. There's hardly any games that have teams matching by skill

- Smurfs are still ruining the matchmaking and especially the experience for lower ranks like below Diamond

- cluttered visuals, even with their newest HUD redesign, because they're so many things happening at the same time

- The hero balances are always too aggressive and they have to spend another 2 months on tweaking the hero and his abilities. This only makes me think that they barely invest any time and money into play testing

- There are still maps that feel like they've been designed by a guy who just started working as an environment&gameplay designer- you either fight through many chokes or you stay in a very open space map/aka sniper paradise

- They had to remove the 2nd tank to get rid of the double shields and let the supports suffer and force them to get used to hiding from snipers and having to beg to be pocketed by a 2nd healer or other teammate

- Whenever a new hero is brought into the game, you almost have to re-adapt to the gameplay. It feels like sometimes they're just shaking the core gameplay of OW with some hero abilities that have been designed after some blizzard devs smoked pot 

They're just throwing another black/gay/lesbian character and the snowball effect starts: people complain about it for 2-3 months, and the balances will be refined after another half or more of a year.

- Balances are dictated by the streamers; people who put tens of thousand of hours into the game and accepted the game as it is because otherwise Blizzard would cut their part. If a streamer says that some ability is overpowered/broken/etc, the community will follow as a sheep and Blizzard will obey to them, not to the general mass of players who are mostly below Master level
Please, do not follow the cult of personality of the Streamers. They will do whatever brings them profits, including closing their eyes in front of even the most frustrating facts about the game just so the publisher will keep help them promote their channel

- some abilities are just not fit for FPS games (in my boomer opinion whallhacks do not belong to any FPS game)

- you have chances of getting banned for bad language a LOT faster than cheating (I'm tracking accounts for months and they still haven't got banned yet). And yes, this community is very easy to startle. Any kind of opinion against the game itself or some teammate is a bannable offense. Even for saying gg ez in chat at the end of the game

- I don't really care about the LGBT group and their beliefs but this game is just throwing this kind of content into my eyes but the truth is that they rely on these kind of groups to become a loyal fan base and keep their player base count which is dipping down since launch

On the positive side of story:
- the game and its netcode is really well optimized 
- you can create your very own custom games without knowledge of scripting

I had hopes for this game but Blizzard had to listen to its investors not its fan base. I don't recommend playing this to anyone, be it from a casual or competitive experience. Leave it behind. It's a soulless game now.
It was born from Team Fortress 2, and it will die before it. Amen.

Connection terminated.I'm sorry to interrupt you, blizzard- if you still even remember that name.You are not hеre to receivе a gift, nor have you been called here by the individual you assume.Although, you have indeed been called.You have all been called here, into a labyrinth of sounds and smells, misdirection, and misfortune.A labyrinth with no exit.A maze with no prize.You don't even realize that you are trapped.Your lust for blood has driven you in endless circles, chasing the cries of children in some unseen chamber, always seeming so near, and somehow out of reach.But you will never find them.None of you will.This is where your story ends.And to you, my brave player base, who somehow found this game not intended for you,Although there was a good game planned for you, I have a feeling that's is what you wanted .I have a feeling that you are not right where you want to be.I am remaining as well.I am nearby.This game will not be remembered and the memory of everything that started this can finally begin to fade away.As every tragedy should.And to you monsters trapped in the corridors, be still, and give up your wallets.They don't belong to you.For most of you, I believe there is peace, and perhaps more waiting for you after the smoke clears.Although, for one of you, the darkest pit of Hell has opened up to swallow you whole,So don't keep the devil waiting, old friend.
